text: Qwen has just released a model on par with GPT-4o... And you can run it locally easily Yep. GPT-4o level AI running offline on a laptop. - Fully open source - Only 3B active parameters - 262k context length natively Quick steps to run it on your machine and details below
author: Paul Couvert

text: This guy literally built a web UI for Claude Code. You can see real-time conversations between Claude Code and your project, plus detailed tool usage for every code edit. 100% opensource and runs locally.
